explanations.B: Not quite. I think you may have just added the probabilities of Green and Red together. We need to do this and then subtract from 1, before splitting our remaining probability equally between Yellow and Blue
explanations.C: Not quite. We need to add the probabilities of Green and Red together, before splitting our remaining probability equally between Yellow and Blue

explanations.A: I think you have found the probability of selecting an Ace, King, Queen or Jack from the whole deck. But we need to work out the probability of a diamond, given that it is an Ace, King Queen or Jack.
explanations.B: The card is an Ace, King, Queen or Jack, so there are only 16 possible cards. Of these, only 4 of them are diamonds so the probability is 4/16.
explanations.C: I think you have found the probability of the Jack, Queen, King or Ace of diamonds from a full pack, but the word "given that" means we are now only choosing from Ace, King, Queen or Jack
explanations.D: I think you have found the probability that the card is an Ace, King, Queen or Jack given that it was a diamond, rather than the other way around.

explanations.A: I think you have found the probability of the Jack, Queen or King of clubs from a full pack, but the word "given that" means we are now only choosing from clubs
explanations.B: You have given the probability of picking a club, but we need the probability of picking a Jack, Queen or King from the clubs
explanations.C: There are 13 clubs, and three of them are Jack, Queen or King. This gives 3/13 as the probability.
explanations.D: You have given the probability of picking any Jack, Queen or King, but we need to be picking a Jack, Queen or King from the clubs

explanations.A: There are 3 green triangles, but we need this as a probability
explanations.B: You have given the probability of finding a green triangle out of the total number of shapes, but the questions says "given that..."
explanations.C: There are 5 green shapes and 3 are triangles, so the probability is 3/5
explanations.D: I think you have answered as if the condition were 'given the shape is a triangle…'. Instead we are told that the shape is green and now want the probability that it is a triangle

explanations.A: I think you have answered as if the condition were 'given the shape is a square…'. Instead we are told that the shape is red and now want the probability that it is a square
explanations.B: You have given the number of squares, but the questions says "given that the shape is red..." so we need to find the probability of choosing a square out of the red shapes
explanations.C: You have given the probability of finding a red square out of the total number of shapes, but the questions says "given that..."
explanations.D: There are 3 red shapes and 2 are squares, so the probability is 2/3
